channel.title: Help
channel.description: I know i am a noob now but.... How i change the total combat level ican be now i only can be lvl 99?? somewan help i already searched but not really found...... :confused:

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @drizzt14 drizzt14
item.description:
@drizzt14 wrote:

whell go to your folder that says characters click on it then go to watever char u wana change rite its stats and watnot whell you can put ur char to 225 and the xp is

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @ralazo ralazo
item.description:
@ralazo wrote:

Click Here:

go into character file, right click on the person and click “edit” look down and ull find somthing like stats, and it says the lvl next to it, just change that lvl to 99, or to 999 ;p

sorry cant find it i have testscape
